de.edgesoft.refereemanager.model

Class ContentModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractModelClass
      • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.jaxb.Content
        • de.edgesoft.refereemanager.model.ContentModel

  • public class ContentModel
extends Content

    Content model, additional methods for jaxb model class.
